# SkillForge AI - Project Instructions

This is a full-stack AI-based learning platform built with React.js (Vite), Tailwind CSS, and Firebase.

## Project Structure
- Frontend: React.js with Vite
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Firebase (Auth + Firestore)
- Language: JavaScript (No TypeScript)

## Key Features
- Two modes: Learn Mode and Build Mode
- Adaptive AI learning tests
- Code editor with AI assistance
- Job application system
- User authentication and profiles

## Development Guidelines
- Keep code modular and well-commented
- No pre-seeded user data
- All user progress starts empty
- Clean component structure
